metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6888 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An error in the "read_metadata_vorbiscomment_()" function (src/libFLAC/stream_decoder.c) in FLAC version 1.3.2 can be exploited to cause a memory leak via a specially crafted FLAC file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> code is different in chromium-browser, doesn't look affected

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
flac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
mame: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
praat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
